articles.description: Follow live text, Test Match Special commentary and in-play clips from day five of the fifth Ashes Test between England and Australia at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Build-up to final day of men's Ashes - will England draw series?

articles.description: Watch live as Australia face Canada at the Women's World Cup, with text updates from both Group B games.

articles.description: Chelsea agree Axel Disasi deal, PSG linked with Barcelona's Ousmane Dembele, plus will West Ham continue their Harry Maguire pursuit?
articles.title: Transfer latest: Chelsea to strengthen defence with Disasi signing

articles.description: Chris Woakes draws a feather of an edge from David Warner for England's first wicket of Australia's second innings.
articles.title: Woakes 'beauty' sees Warner fall for 60

articles.description: Co-hosts Australia keep their Fifa Women's World Cup hopes alive by reaching the second round at the expense of Olympic champions Canada.
articles.title: Australia thump Canada to keep World Cup dream alive

articles.description: Manchester United agree a 10-year extension to their partnership with kit manufacturer Adidas worth a minimum of £900m.
articles.title: Man Utd agree 10-year Adidas extension worth £900m

articles.description: Watch highlights as Japan thrash Spain 4-0 to top Group C and set up a last 16 tie against Norway at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Japan thrash Spain to set up last-16 Norway game

articles.description: The World Cycling Championship in Glasgow will be emotionally wrought for Katie Archibald after partner Rab Wardell's death.
articles.title: 'After Rab left, I stopped being scared on the bike'

articles.description: England midfielder Georgia Stanway feels confident she can fill in for the injured Keira Walsh in the Lionesses' final group game against China.
articles.title: England's Stanway relishing filling in for injured Walsh

articles.description: Players and managers are warned they face tougher punishments for poor behaviour at games following the release of new rules.
articles.title: Players face harsher punishments for bad behaviour
